attributes.additional_details:
The Patriots of this country are sick and tired of being called out as the trouble makers when actually it is BLM and Extinction Rebellion. 
All we want is to be treated fairly instead of second class citizens.There is an Equal Rights Law which we feel the Police are ignoring, the government is also bowing down to the trouble makers. 
We now feel Law and Order no longer exists in the UK. 
GET THE POLI E BACK ON TRACK
attributes.background:
We the English Patriots are fed up with the Police taking the knee to BLM and doing nothing to stop Extinction Rebellion blocking roads and ambulances on blue lights amongst other things.
The British Police are supposed to keep Law and Order yet they do not but will arrest proud English Patriots.

rejection.details:
You seem to want reform of the police but don't specify what you want to change.

You may wish to sign the following petition which relates to police service reform: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326310
